readme:
Synders Toolkit - Just a bunch of Tools 4 ATOM
==============================================
A bunch of useful and time-saving tools and utilities for GitHubs ATOM Code Editor. **Please Note**
This package is still Alpha and still "Work in Progress" and currently contains just 3 different
"Synder Tools".

Tools
-----
The most tools are available as shortcut or using the Synder Overlay menu on the right.

-	Base64 Encoder and Decoder
-	Beautify "too-long" Strings in CSS / Less / SASS (SCSS)
-	Render & Compile Less files into plain CSS

### Upcoming Tools
Synder isn't finished yet and at least the following tools should be available in further releases.

-   A working file header maintainer
-   Minify JavaScript using UglifyJS (3)
-   Validate CSS / Less files and HTML Code

Fancy Instructions
------------------

### How to Beautify
![Beautify Strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pytesNET/synders-toolkit/master/assets/beautify.gif)
